titles.title: Defending Memory Chip Supply Chains from the Chinese Communist Party Act
Defending Memory Chip Supply Chains from the Chinese Communist Party Act
A bill to impose sanctions on certain foreign flash memory integrated circuit companies that threaten the interests of the United States.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Defending Memory Chip Supply Chains from the Chinese Communist Party Act
This bill requires the President to impose sanctions on entities that produce flash memory integrated circuits of at least 128 layers and that have financial links to countries of concern. The bill also requires sanctions on the Yangtze Memory Technologies Corporation.
